title: Video: Iran's Drones Hit Aramco Oil Refinery In Saudi Arabia
summary_full: Saudi Aramco has temporarily shut its Ras Tanura refinery after the facility was struck by a drone.
summary_public: Saudi Aramco has temporarily shut its Ras Tanura refinery after the facility was struck by a drone.
